headline: AVAIO Digital Breaks Ground on $6 Billion Brandon Data Center Campus; Leading Mississippi Contractor Begins Site Work
summary: AVAIO Digital Partners (AVAIO Digital) today announced that site work is officially underway on its $6 billion Taurus Data Center Hub in Brandon, Mississippi. After executing an Agreement for Electric Service with Entergy in August, the start of site work on the 329-acre campus marks another important milestone in advancing the project, which will create a new center of gravity for cloud and artificial intelligence infrastructure in the Southeast. content.summary: AVAIO Digital Partners (AVAIO Digital) today announced that site work is officially underway on its $6 billion Taurus Data Center Hub in Brandon, Mississippi. headline: EXECUTIVE-LED BUSINESS ROUNDTABLE DRIVES INDUSTRIAL GROWTH AND GLOBAL COMPETITIVENESS IN THE GULF SOUTH
summary: Today, a coalition of leading energy and industrial executives launched the Gulf South Business Roundtable (GSBR). The effort is dedicated to advancing economic competitiveness, infrastructure development, and industrial growth across Alabama (AL), Arkansas (AR), Louisiana (LA), Mississippi (MS), and Texas (TX).

content.title: EXECUTIVE-LED BUSINESS ROUNDTABLE DRIVES INDUSTRIAL GROWTH AND GLOBAL COMPETITIVENESS IN THE GULF SOUTH
content.summary: Today, a coalition of leading energy and industrial executives launched the Gulf South Business Roundtable (GSBR). The effort is dedicated to advancing economic competitiveness, infrastructure development, and industrial growth across Alabama (AL), Arkansas (AR), Louisiana (LA), Mississippi (MS), and Texas (TX).

thumbnail.caption: Official logo of the Gulf South Business Roundtable (GSBR), a newly launched executive-led coalition uniting industry and community leaders to drive economic competitiveness, energy infrastructure, and policy alignment across Alabama, Arkansas, Louisiana, Mississippi, and Texas.
